title: Chesapeake Bay: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning       In this section, you will find documents and other planning materials related to: 路  Management of the Captain John Smith Chesapeake and Star-Spangled Banner national historic trails; 路  Public access planning to create recreational facilities; 路  Collaborative work to protect large landscapes; and, 路  Expansion of Chesapeake Youth Corps workforces engaging youth in outdoor recreation and service-learning projects.
